DESCRIPTION:
Deploy Mattermost to test the 'db' relation.

    Mattermost needs TLS enabled on PgBouncer to correctly connect to it.

    Args:
        ops_test: The ops test framework
NAME: test_mattermost_db

DESCRIPTION: Tests deploying and relating to the Indico charm.
NAME: test_indico_datatabase

DESCRIPTION: Build and deploy one unit of PostgreSQL and then test config with wrong parameters.
NAME: test_config_parameters

DESCRIPTION: Test that there is a read-only endpoint in a standalone cluster.
NAME: test_no_read_only_endpoint_in_standalone_cluster

DESCRIPTION: Test that the pre-upgrade-check action runs successfully.
NAME: test_pre_upgrade_check

DESCRIPTION: Test updating from stable channel.
NAME: test_upgrade_from_stable

DESCRIPTION: Test that the pre-upgrade-check action runs successfully.
NAME: test_pre_upgrade_check

DESCRIPTION: Test the deployment of the charm.
NAME: test_trust

DESCRIPTION: Check version is accurate.
NAME: test_database_version

DESCRIPTION: Test that there is read-only endpoint in a scaled up cluster.
NAME: test_read_only_endpoint_in_scaled_up_cluster

DESCRIPTION: Check we can't write in readonly.
NAME: test_cant_write_in_readonly

DESCRIPTION: Test updating charm config updates pgbouncer config & relation data.
NAME: test_config_updates

DESCRIPTION: Test data is replicated to new units after a scale up.
NAME: test_scaling

DESCRIPTION: Simple test to ensure that the PostgreSQL and application charms get deployed.
NAME: test_deploy_stable

DESCRIPTION: Test that the pgbouncer and postgres charms can relate to one another.
NAME: test_create_db_legacy_relation

DESCRIPTION: Test that the user is removed when the relation is broken.
NAME: test_relation_broken

DESCRIPTION: Test that the pgbouncer and postgres charms can relate to one another.
NAME: test_scaled_relations

DESCRIPTION: Test we have the correct pebble services.
NAME: test_multiple_pebble_services

DESCRIPTION:
Rejoins the TLS relation and check through the test app the it is on.

    Args:
        ops_test: The ops test framework
NAME: test_add_tls

DESCRIPTION:
Scale down PGB while TLS is enabled.

    Args:
        ops_test: The ops test framework
NAME: test_scale_down_pgb

DESCRIPTION: Check we can read things in readonly.
NAME: test_readonly_reads

DESCRIPTION: Build and deploy pgbouncer charm.
NAME: test_build_and_deploy

DESCRIPTION: Test endpoints when pgbouncer-k8s is related to a TLS operator.
NAME: test_expose_external_with_tls

DESCRIPTION: Simple test to ensure that the PostgreSQL and application charms get deployed.
NAME: test_deploy_latest

DESCRIPTION: Test that the charm can be related to the data integrator without extra user roles.
NAME: test_relation_with_data_integrator

DESCRIPTION: Test that two different applications connect to the database with different credentials.
NAME: test_each_relation_has_unique_credentials

DESCRIPTION: Test that the pgbouncer and postgres charms can relate to one another.
NAME: test_relate_pgbouncer_to_postgres

DESCRIPTION:
Removes the TLS relation and check through the test app the it is off.

    Args:
        ops_test: The ops test framework
NAME: test_remove_tls

DESCRIPTION: Test basic functionality of database relation interface.
NAME: test_database_relation_with_charm_libraries

DESCRIPTION: Test that an application can request additional databases using the same interface.
NAME: test_an_application_can_request_multiple_databases

DESCRIPTION: Check we can update and delete things.
NAME: test_database_usage

DESCRIPTION:
Scale up PGB while TLS is enabled.

    Args:
        ops_test: The ops test framework
NAME: test_scale_up_pgb

DESCRIPTION: Simple test to ensure that the PostgreSQL and application charms get deployed.
NAME: test_deploy_stable

DESCRIPTION: Check these relations all work when scaling pgbouncer.
NAME: test_scaling

DESCRIPTION: Test that we can exit relations with multiple units without breaking anything.
NAME: test_exit_relations

DESCRIPTION: Test that the pre-upgrade-check action runs successfully.
NAME: test_pre_upgrade_check

DESCRIPTION: Test the relation blocks with extensions.
NAME: test_extensions_blocking

DESCRIPTION: Build and deploy pgbouncer charm.
NAME: test_build_and_deploy

DESCRIPTION: Verify that logs will be rotated.
NAME: test_logrotate

DESCRIPTION: Tests that the connection is possible after the pod is deleted.
NAME: test_connection_is_possible_after_pod_deletion

DESCRIPTION: Test the expose-external config option.
NAME: test_expose_external

DESCRIPTION: Test admin permissions.
NAME: test_database_admin_permissions
